properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 6 at 9:12PM CST until January 9 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
...The flood warning continues for the following rivers in
Kentucky...
Green River at Paradise affecting Muhlenberg County

.Minor flooding continues along the Green River at Paradise. The
river has crested, and water levels have begun to fall. The river
is forecast to fall below flood stage Thursday.

The Flood Warning continues for
the Green River at Paradise
* until Thursday evening.
* At  8:15 PM Monday the stage was 383.0 feet.
* Flood Stage is 380.0 feet.
* Minor flooding is occurring and Minor flooding is forecast.
* Forecast...The river will continue to fall to below flood stage by
Thursday early afternoon.
properties.instruction:
SAFETY MESSAGE...

Never drive cars...trucks or sport utility vehicles through flooded
areas. The water may be too deep to allow safe passage. Never allow
children to play in or near flood waters. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather
Radio or your local media for further statements and possible updated
forecasts.

Additional information is available at
http://www.crh.noaa.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=pah /lower case/
